Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

I am a software engineer from Voronezh (Russia). I have been working in development since I was 16 years old (2003). He studied at Voronezh State University in the Faculty of Applied Mathematics and graduated with a degree in system programming. I have experience in programming in C++. As a backend developer, he worked on developing sites on Ruby on Rails, Django & Node.js, then switched to unbundling distributed systems in the Go language, using k8s, Kafka & PostgreSQL. Now as a data engineer, I am engaged in the development of infrastructure for DS & ML. There is experience of the team as a team leader & project manager. Since 2022 I live in Prague (Czech Republic).
